item.description:
Notre ami Robert a gentillement offert de vous inviter chez lui. C'est un fete pour celebrer la saison! Sa maison est tres interessant et tres francaise- il faut la voir! This will be on Saturday morning. Some of you who have not been able to come to Panera on Wednesday evenings now have another opportunity to speak French with us! It doesn't matter if you've never attended-if you have received this email, you are invited! Priere d'apporter quelque chose a manger. This will be a "potluck" brunch.Starts at 10:30 and continues for several hours- come for as little or as long as you like.
You can Mapquest his street- it is close to Route 17 near the end of Main Street, close to the Audubon Center and South Glastonbury.
RSVP's are appreciated.
Merci

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Celebrate the holidays chez cafe Robert
